title: DNA Extraction from Symbiodinium Cultures
original description: Dinoflagellates are unicellular algae that can have photosynthetic or nonphotosynthetic lifestyles. Dinoflagellates in the genus Symbiodinium can enter endosymbiotic associations with corals, providing the metabolic basis for the highly productive and biologically diverse coral-reef ecosystems (Hoegh-Guldberg, 1999), as well as with other cnidarians, including sea anemones and jellyfish, and noncnidarian hosts (Trench, 1993; Lobban et al., 2002; Mordret et al., 2016).   Here I describe a protocol for isolating total DNA from Symbiodinium cells.
ai_generated_description: This molecular biology protocol is designed for the extraction of total DNA from Symbiodinium cells, a genus of dinoflagellates that form endosymbiotic associations with corals and other marine organisms. The objective is to provide a step-by-step method for growing, harvesting, lysing, purifying, and precipitating DNA from these cells for further analysis and research purposes.

def grow_cells(medium, phase, concentration):
    pass

def spin_down_cells(speed, temperature, time):

def prepare_lysis_buffer(buffer, dilution_factor, volume_needed):
    pass

def resuspend_pellet(pellet, buffer_volume):
    pass

def add_solvent(solution, solvent_volume, mix_method):
    pass

def separate_phases(centrifuge_params):
    pass

def treat_with_enzyme(solution, enzyme, incubation_params):
    pass

def transfer_upper_layer(transfer_volume, destination_tube):
    pass

def aggregate_dna(solution, ethanol_volume, incubation_params, centrifuge_params):
    pass

def wash_and_dry_pellet(pellet, ethanol, rinse_params):
    pass

def incubate_solution(solution, incubation_params):
    pass

# Protocol steps
grow_cells(medium="IMK or IMK+casein hydrolysate", phase="mid log", concentration="106 cells/mL")
spin_down_cells(speed=1000, temperature="room temp", time="5 minutes")
prepare_lysis_buffer(buffer="2X lysis buffer", dilution_factor=0.5, volume_needed="500 µl per 1 million cells")
resuspend_pellet(pellet="cell pellet", buffer_volume="500 µl 1X lysis buffer")
add_solvent(solution="cell suspension", solvent_volume="500 µl Phenol:Chloroform:Isoamyl alcohol (25:24:1)", mix_method="inverting")
separate_phases(centrifuge_params="13,000 g, 5 minutes")
transfer_upper_layer(transfer_volume="upper layer", destination_tube="new 1.5 mL eppendorf tube")
treat_with_enzyme(solution="supernatant", enzyme="4 µl Ribonuclease A (20mg/mL)", incubation_params="30 minutes, 37°C")
add_solvent(solution="treated supernatant", solvent_volume="500 µl Phenol:Chloroform:Isoamyl alcohol (25:24:1)", mix_method="inverting")
separate_phases(centrifuge_params="13,000 g, 5 minutes")
transfer_upper_layer(transfer_volume="upper layer", destination_tube="new 1.5 mL eppendorf tube")
add_solvent(solution="upper layer supernatant", solvent_volume="500 µl Chloroform:Isoamyl alcohol (24:1)", mix_method="inverting")
separate_phases(centrifuge_params="13,000 g, 5 minutes")
transfer_upper_layer(transfer_volume="upper layer", destination_tube="new 1.5 mL eppendorf tube")
aggregate_dna(solution="upper layer supernatant", ethanol_volume="2.5 volumes absolute Ethanol", incubation_params="ice 30 min or -20 ºC overnight", centrifuge_params="13,000 g, 20 minutes")
wash_and_dry_pellet(pellet="dna pellet", ethanol="70% Ethanol", rinse_params="1 mL, 1 time")
resuspend_and_quantify_dna(pellet="dried dna pellet", h2o_volume="50 µl", quantification_method="NanoDrop and 1% agarose gel")

# end of protocol
